data.title: Love this place
data.text: Home made calzones, fresh sausages and other meats, we just love this place.  Brings back memories of the Italian cubby holes that used to be all over north Denver and Wheatridge but most are gone now.  Great flavors.

data.title: Eat Here!!
data.text: Eat here! This little Italian bakery and deli, in the older, downtown area of Westminster is the real deal. A great meat counter. A great selection of imported pasta and many other culinarily Italian delights. Great dessert items. Great catering. Great cannolis (mmmmmmmmm.....I can smell them, now!). Great, great service. Larry and Dino are awesome proprietors. You owe it to yourself to visit this place. Do it today!

data.title: Always fresh.
data.text: I get takeout deli meats and desserts. It carries a lot of imported Italian foods. The clearance rack is my favorite.

data.title: We Love Valente's
data.text: My husband and I have been to Valente's several times for lunch, shopping, and to pick up deli tray orders. This is a wonderful shop. There is a wide variety of prepared foods (deli, bakery, and frozen) as well as a great selection of Italian pastas, sauces, olive oils and treats. The sandwiches and cannolis are a fantastic value for the money and every employee we have had the pleasure of meeting has been wonderful. If you live in the area you HAVE to try Valente's!

data.title: Fantastic Service and great food!
data.text: I made a special request of the owner, Dino, asking him if he could deliver a meal to a friend whose husband had passed away.  I was out of town and could not deliver a homemade meal myself.  Dino and his staff put together a perfect meal for 8 and went out of their way to deliver it to my friend!  Pricing was reasonable, and the entire process was easy and they were all so friendly and nice.  Highly recommended, they aim to please!  Food received raves from my friend!

data.title: OMG!!!!
data.text: I don't know that I would call this a restaurant, it's more of an ethnic grocery store, with a magic factory in back. It is in the middle of an old strip mall. You enter a clean but older place and much like a grocery store it has aisles of Italian goods for sale. In the back you are greeted by a friendly staff behind a case of the most wonderful things. This is where the magic happens. It is a bakery and all though I only tried a few things I am confident that everything is of the same quality. It is a delicatessen, and if the bakery is great this is some adjective beyond great. The sandwiches are piled high with quality meat and cheese on fresh baked bread. Mmmmmm deliciousness follows like a freight train. No pretense here, no fancy sauces or choices of a salad to pump up the flavor of your sandwich. They also have cannolis, I didn't have room for one, but by the way they were flying out of there I think it's safe to assume they are great too.

data.title: True Italian
data.text: This store has everything you could want.  Huge variety of olive oils, pasta.  Fresh meats.  Will certainly return on our next time in town.

data.title: Chocolate Dipped Dessert Cannoli $2.49 EA
data.text: The  chocolate dipped dessert cannoli was not to sweet or to rich it was yummy.  My boyfriend loved it. Next time we will order the italian sausage combo $5.99 with a drink and chips. Thank you from Rita Bennett and Steve Nordstrom from Westminster Colorado

data.title: Best canolis in town, and great prices on deli cuts and cheese.  Good selection of imported pantry items, too!  Try the...
data.text: Best canolis in town, and great prices on deli cuts and cheese.  Good selection of imported pantry items, too!  Try the Scamorza ... nice and salty.
